p.em: "Each student will have the educational opportunity to reach his or her maximum potential by challenging all students to higher levels of achievement. We will provide the environment, encouragement and instruction to meet this goal while developing the whole child physically, socially, emotionally and culturally."

div.span: Our mission: "Each student will have the educational opportunity to reach his or her maximum potential by challenging all students to higher levels of achievement. We will provide the environment, encouragement and instruction to meet this goal while developing the whole child physically, socially, emotionally and culturally."
